name: laruche
description: La Ruche ======== La Ruche is an interactive editor of exercises for the [WIMS pedagogical platform](http://wims.auto.u-psud.fr/wims/) (see also [the WIMSEDU association](http://wimsedu.info)) that produces OEF (Open Exercise Format) code. This code may be sent or copied to a WIMS server that will generate the exercise, show it to a student, mark it, etc...
author: Dadou001
